meanings.sent1: Her indelicateness in conversation often led to awkward moments.
meanings.sent2: The indelicateness of his manners made others uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Despite her indelicateness, she always spoke her mind.
meanings.sent4: The indelicateness of his jokes left everyone cringing.
meanings.sent5: The indelicateness of his behavior was impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The quality of being inappropriate or offensive
meanings.sent1: The indelicateness of his remarks shocked everyone present.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her indelicateness in choosing topics for discussion.
meanings.sent3: His indelicateness in dress sense was a constant source of amusement.
meanings.sent4: The indelicateness of the situation made it hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The indelicateness of his actions left a lasting impression on everyone.
